items.title: Sources: Utd sacked Amorim after Wilcox row
items.summary: Ruben Amorim was sacked by Manchester United in the aftermath of an explosive meeting with director of football Jason Wilcox on Friday, sources have confirmed to ESPN.

items.title: Sources: Rosenior in London, close to Chelsea job
items.summary: Chelsea are moving closer to the appointment of Liam Rosenior as their new head coach after the 41-year-old arrived in London on Sunday, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Bayern wonderkid Karl reveals Real Madrid dream
items.summary: Bayern Munich wonderkid Lennart Karl has revealed that we "definitely" wants to play for Real Madrid at some point in his career, calling the Spanish giants his "dream club."

items.title: Wrexham hero Paul Mullin returns to club
items.summary: Paul Mullin has returned to Wrexham after his loan spell at Wigan Athletic was cut short halfway through the season.

items.title: Heracles laat oog vallen op Zweedse middenvelder
items.summary: Heracles Almelo hoopt zich deze maand te versterken met Erik Ahlstrand. De nummer zeventien van de Eredivisie wil de Zweedse middenvelder overnemen van Sankt Pauli, waar hij nauwelijks aan spelen toekomt.

items.title: Ruben Amorim sacked by Manchester United and Darren Fletcher takes interim role ‚Äì live
items.summary: Amorim sacked after losing power struggle over transfers Darren Fletcher to take charge for game at Burnley Have any thoughts? Send them to Yara via email 1. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer (2018-2021) ‚Äì 54% win rate The Norwegian started off as a caretaker and his impact was so great that United granted him the full-time job. Undoubtedly the best football of the post-Ferguson era was played under Solskjaer, who preferred his side to counter-attack at speed and enjoyed a sensational record against Manchester City and Pep Guardiola, beating them three times at the Etihad. Came second in the league in 2020-201 but was denied an elusive trophy by the agonising 2021 Europa League final defeat to Villarreal on penalties. Continue reading...

items.title: Vaessen blijft bij Groningen, Schalk wil terug naar Nederland
items.summary: We zitten in het intermezzo tussen de zomer- en winterwindow, toch druppelt er in het najaar vaak nog een aantal transfers binnen. In dit blog vind je alle speculaties en bevestigde transfers in Nederland. Bekijk hier ons blog voor de transferperikelen in het buitenland.

items.title: West Ham sign Argentina striker Castellanos
items.summary: Valentin 'Taty' Castellanos says he will bring his "fighting spirit" to West Ham after joining from Lazio on a four-and-a-half-year deal.

items.title: Namli op de weg terug naar PEC Zwolle
items.summary: Younes Namli lijkt terug te keren bij PEC Zwolle. De 31-jarige Deen moet overkomen van Le Havre, waar hij weinig aan spelen toekomt. Ingewijden bevestigen het nieuws uit Frankrijk.

items.title: Man City increase interest in Palace captain Guehi
items.summary: Manchester City are emerging as contenders to sign Crystal Palace captain Marc Guehi in January following injuries to defenders Josko Gvardiol and Ruben Dias.

items.title: 'Amorim's toxic exit the latest chaotic chapter in Ratcliffe's reign'
items.summary: Ruben Amorim's acrimonious exit is the latest example of Manchester United's chaos and instability under Sir Jim Ratcliffe, says Phil McNulty.

items.title: Onderzoek: Eredivisie het walhalla voor talenten, AZ en Groningen verjongen
items.summary: FC Groningen en AZ geven dit seizoen in de Eredivisie de meeste speelminuten aan spelers tot en met 21 jaar. Bij beide ploegen is ruim veertig procent van de totale speeltijd ingevuld door jongelingen.

items.title: Who could be the next permanent Man Utd manager?
items.summary: A former Manchester United player? A current Premier League manager? An overseas coach? BBC Sport looks at the possible replacements for Ruben Amorim.

items.title: West Ham backing Nuno as Hammers make second January signing
items.summary: West Ham have no intention of sacking boss Nuno Espirito Santo as the club made their second January signing with the ¬£25.2m arrival of forward Taty Castellanos from Lazio.

items.title: Capello ergert zich kapot aan niveau van scheidsrechters: 'Een maffia'
items.summary: Fabio Capello heeft met avonturen bij onder meer AC Milan, Real Madrid en Juventus een glansrijke trainersloopbaan achter de rug. Toch is de 79-jarige Italiaan blij dat hij niets meer met de arbitrage van tegenwoordig te maken heeft. Capello geniet van zijn pensioen, maar ergert zich daarnaast ook kapot aan het niveau van scheidsrechters en de bijbehorende VAR.

items.title: Ruben Amorim sacked as Man United head coach
items.summary: Manchester United fired Amorim less than 24 hours after he held a stunning news conference following the 1-1 draw against Leeds United in which he urged club bosses to "do your jobs."

items.title: Premier League Darts 2026 line-up announcement LIVE: Who will be picked?
'Very negative and emotional' - How Amorim became 'untenable' for Man Utd
items.summary: Ruben Amorim's emotional and inconsistent behaviour was a key part of Manchester United's decision to sack him, Sky Sports News understands.

items.title: Amorim sacked by Man Utd after 14 months in charge
items.summary: Manchester United sack manager Ruben Amorim after he criticised the club's hierarchy following Sunday's 1-1 draw at Leeds.

items.title: Ruben Amorim sacked by Manchester United after losing power struggle over transfers
items.summary: Head coach goes after outburst at Leeds game Oversaw worst Premier League finish of 15th Live reaction and updates after Amorim sacked Ruben Amorim has been sacked by Manchester United after 14 months as their head coach. He leaves after a power struggle with the hierarchy over transfer policy, with Amorim demanding his colleagues in the recruitment department ‚Äúdo their job‚Äù after Sunday‚Äôs draw at Leeds. Amorim believed United were prepared to back him in the January window should a major signing become available but then said last Friday: ‚ÄúWe have no conversation to have any change in the squad.‚Äù Continue reading...
